days.title: Crowdsourcing - Harnessing Collective Intelligence
days.learning_objective: Practice collaborative problem-solving while understanding how collective intelligence can enhance democratic decision-making and innovation.

days.title: Environmental Technology - Protecting Our Planet
days.learning_objective: Explore sustainable technology while understanding how environmental solutions require international cooperation and equitable implementation.

days.title: Economics - How Resources Are Distributed
days.learning_objective: Understand resource allocation while exploring how economic literacy enables informed civic participation and advocacy for equitable policies.

days.title: Collage - Art from Assembled Pieces
days.learning_objective: Practice creative synthesis while understanding how collage techniques enable new perspectives and creative problem-solving approaches.

days.title: Magnetic Fields - Invisible Lines of Force
days.learning_objective: Understand electromagnetic fields while exploring how magnetic phenomena enable motors, generators, and data storage technology.

days.title: Innovation Funding - Financing New Ideas
days.learning_objective: Understand innovation economics while exploring how funding structures affect which innovations get developed and who benefits from them.

days.title: Environmental Studies - Humans and Nature
days.learning_objective: Explore human-environment interactions while building systems thinking skills essential for addressing climate change and sustainability challenges.

days.title: Public Speaking - Sharing Your Voice
days.learning_objective: Practice democratic communication while understanding how public speaking skills enable civic engagement, leadership, and social change advocacy.

days.title: Animation - Bringing Drawings to Life
days.learning_objective: Explore motion graphics while understanding how animation enables storytelling, education, and cultural expression in digital media.

days.title: Jewelry Making - Adorning the Human Body
days.learning_objective: Practice precision crafts while understanding how decorative arts reflect cultural values, economic systems, and personal expression.

days.title: Mixed Media - Combining Different Art Forms
days.learning_objective: Practice creative integration while understanding how interdisciplinary approaches enhance innovation and problem-solving effectiveness.

days.title: Wave Interference - When Waves Meet
days.learning_objective: Understand wave interactions while exploring how interference principles enable noise cancellation, optical computing, and quantum technology.

days.title: Innovation Policy - Government's Role in Creativity
days.learning_objective: Understand technology governance while exploring how policy can foster innovation while protecting human rights and promoting equity.

days.title: Patent System - Protecting New Ideas
days.learning_objective: Understand intellectual property while exploring how patent systems can either encourage or hinder innovation and technological access.

days.title: Exercise Physiology - How Movement Helps You
days.learning_objective: Apply movement science while understanding how physical activity research informs public health policy and personal wellbeing.

days.title: Environmental Innovation - Solutions for Sustainability
days.learning_objective: Practice sustainable design while understanding how environmental technology must balance effectiveness with accessibility and justice.

days.title: Brainstorming Techniques - Generating Ideas
days.learning_objective: Practice creative thinking while understanding how structured ideation can enhance democratic deliberation and collaborative problem-solving.

days.title: Street Art - Public Expression
days.learning_objective: Explore public art while understanding how street art enables social commentary, cultural expression, and democratic space-making.

days.title: Doppler Effect - Why Sounds Change Pitch
days.learning_objective: Understand wave physics while exploring how Doppler principles enable radar, medical imaging, and astronomical observation.

days.title: Innovation Communication - Sharing New Ideas
days.learning_objective: Practice persuasive communication while understanding how effective innovation communication enables democratic input on technology development.

days.title: Systems Thinking - Understanding Complex Interactions
days.learning_objective: Master holistic analysis while understanding how systems thinking enables effective responses to climate change, inequality, and technological challenges.

days.title: Innovation Culture - Environments That Foster Creativity
days.learning_objective: Understand organizational culture while exploring how institutional environments can either promote or suppress innovation and democratic participation.

days.title: Nutrition Science - Fueling Your Body Right
days.learning_objective: Apply nutritional knowledge while understanding how food science research informs agriculture, public health, and global food justice.

days.title: Stress and Relaxation - Managing Life's Pressures
days.learning_objective: Practice stress management while understanding how psychological wellbeing affects civic engagement, learning, and community resilience.

days.title: Installation Art - Art That Transforms Space
days.learning_objective: Explore environmental art while understanding how spatial design affects social interaction, community identity, and democratic participation.

days.title: Centrifugal Force - The Outward Push of Spinning
days.learning_objective: Understand rotational physics while exploring how centrifugal principles enable separation technology, spacecraft design, and industrial processes.

days.title: Innovation Implementation - Making Ideas Reality
days.learning_objective: Practice project management while understanding how implementation strategies affect whether innovations serve justice or perpetuate inequality.

days.title: Environmental Health - How Your Surroundings Affect You
days.learning_objective: Understand environmental factors while exploring how environmental justice connects public health, social equity, and democratic governance.

days.title: Biodiversity
days.learning_objective: Explore biological diversity while understanding how biodiversity conservation requires international cooperation and sustainable development practices.

days.title: Migration Patterns - Nature's Great Journeys
days.learning_objective: Understand movement patterns while exploring how migration research informs conservation, climate adaptation, and understanding of global interconnection.
